news_header: Mini, a monkey rescued from a torture ring, was rehabilitated and released back into the wild after two years.
news_text: Mini was rescued following a BBC Eye investigation that uncovered a global online monkey torture ring. After her mother was killed, she was tortured by her owner for sadistic customers in the US and UK. After two years of rehabilitation at a sanctuary, Mini was deemed ready for release back into the wild, a process documented by BBC reporter Rebecca Henschke. The story highlights the ongoing issues of animal cruelty and the efforts to combat it.
